sqlMap.select: select a.I_GGBH as a_I_GGBH, a.V_GGXX as a_V_GGXX, a.V_FBR as a_V_FBR, a.D_FBSJ as a_D_FBSJ, a.V_GGBT as a_V_GGBT, a.V_FBFW as a_V_FBFW, a.V_BLQX as a_V_BLQX, a.V_GGFJ as a_V_GGFJ, a.V_SHR as a_V_SHR, a.V_SHYJ as a_V_SHYJ, a.V_GGZT as a_V_GGZT, a.FILLER as a_FILLER, a.V_XTMC as a_V_XTMC from BKLS.ABF_T_GGB a where a.I_GGBH = #iGgbh:INTEGER# and a.V_GGXX = #vGgxx:VARCHAR#

select a.I_GGBH as a_I_GGBH, a.V_GGXX as a_V_GGXX, a.V_FBR as a_V_FBR, a.D_FBSJ as a_D_FBSJ, a.V_GGBT as a_V_GGBT, a.V_FBFW as a_V_FBFW, a.V_BLQX as a_V_BLQX, a.V_GGFJ as a_V_GGFJ, a.V_SHR as a_V_SHR, a.V_SHYJ as a_V_SHYJ, a.V_GGZT as a_V_GGZT, a.FILLER as a_FILLER, a.V_XTMC as a_V_XTMC from BKLS.ABF_T_GGB a
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.delete: delete from BKLS.ABF_T_GGB where I_GGBH = #iGgbh:INTEGER# and V_GGXX = #vGgxx:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into BKLS.ABF_T_GGB (I_GGBH, V_GGXX, V_FBR, D_FBSJ, V_GGBT, V_FBFW, V_BLQX, V_GGFJ, V_SHR, V_SHYJ, V_GGZT, FILLER, V_XTMC) values (#iGgbh:INTEGER#, #vGgxx:VARCHAR#, #vFbr:VARCHAR#, #dFbsj:TIMESTAMP#, #vGgbt:VARCHAR#, #vFbfw:VARCHAR#, #vBlqx:VARCHAR#, #vGgfj:VARCHAR#, #vShr:VARCHAR#, #vShyj:VARCHAR#, #vGgzt:VARCHAR#, #filler:VARCHAR#, #vXtmc:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update BKLS.ABF_T_GGB set V_FBR = #vFbr:VARCHAR#, D_FBSJ = #dFbsj:TIMESTAMP#, V_GGBT = #vGgbt:VARCHAR#, V_FBFW = #vFbfw:VARCHAR#, V_BLQX = #vBlqx:VARCHAR#, V_GGFJ = #vGgfj:VARCHAR#, V_SHR = #vShr:VARCHAR#, V_SHYJ = #vShyj:VARCHAR#, V_GGZT = #vGgzt:VARCHAR#, FILLER = #filler:VARCHAR#, V_XTMC = #vXtmc:VARCHAR# where I_GGBH = #iGgbh:INTEGER# and V_GGXX = #vGgxx:VARCHAR#

select a.I_GGBH as a_I_GGBH, a.V_GGXX as a_V_GGXX, a.V_FBR as a_V_FBR, a.D_FBSJ as a_D_FBSJ, a.V_GGBT as a_V_GGBT, a.V_FBFW as a_V_FBFW, a.V_BLQX as a_V_BLQX, a.V_GGFJ as a_V_GGFJ, a.V_SHR as a_V_SHR, a.V_SHYJ as a_V_SHYJ, a.V_GGZT as a_V_GGZT, a.FILLER as a_FILLER, a.V_XTMC as a_V_XTMC,b.orgname from BKLS.ABF_T_GGB a ,om_organization b where 1=1
